document.full_text: henrik zetterberg scored his second goal of the game to help the detroit red wings snap the washington capitals' nine-game winning streak with a 3-2 victory wednesday night.
document.title: red wings edge caps, 3-2, to snap streak
lines_and_colors: henrik zetterberg scored his second goal of the game to help the detroit red wings snap the washington capitals' nine-game winning streak with a 3-2 victory wednesday night.
